title: League 10 Year - Let's play some games!
body:
I started playing League 9.5 years ago, and its been my favorite game ever since. Before I joined Riot, I enjoyed engaging with the devs on these boards, so I'm here to play a few games with y'all throughout the day (NA only sorry). Let's play some Summoner's Rift or ARAM, I can answer any questions you have about League/Riot/Design, and I'll also give out some RP along the way. Just post your summoner name here and I'll invite you when I'm starting a game. 

EDIT: I'm off for the day, but thank you all for playing, and happy League 10 year anniversary!

replies.body: Game 3 - my garbage Vlad was heavy, but y'all still carried me. Thanks to PartyPoppers, iMaB3AST, platsplat and Freyja Wion for the awesome teamfight wombo comp. Game 4 shortly!
Thanks for the game Staryuu, LuaDotExe, Rhejis, Im Bask. That Vayne Yi carry was something else (and my Sion is way too rusty). Game 2 up soon!
We've jumped into game but will be playing more after.

Hi,
I heard that you wanted changed Karma is true?

Game 5 was a loss, but well fought (sometimes the ARAM gods give you a full AP team comp). Thanks you Heavens Karma, ShadowX74, Fastlich and Regi for the great game. Not playing any more today, but thank you all for playing and happy League 10 year :)
Game 4 was great, actually did OK on Xayah. Thank you Saint Lazarus, Luxray, Nicholas Paul, and Rikuu for crushing that game with me. Going to start up my last game shortly :)

Would love the chance to play, if you're able to fit me in. Thanks!

(Apostle of Light, by the way)
Game 2 also a win! Kayle carry and really solid teamfighting yall - thank you Dreamhare, liketofight69, wendystclair, and Princess Pippa for carrying my Vi. Game 3 soon!
Hey, just curious if you've started your last game already :) If you haven't I figured I'd wait just in case you were going to invite.
Yay I wanna playy :D my ign is Kasemi
